name: 楊勝明
objective: 本課程為基礎電力電子學各種轉換器電路的實習，內容包括：(1)AC-DC轉換器實習，(2)Boost DC-DC轉換器實習，(3) Buck DC-DC轉換器實習，(4) Flyback DC-DC轉換器實習(5)全橋式DC-DC轉換器實習，(6) 全橋式DC-AC轉換器。
schedule:
1. Introduction
2. Use of laboratory equipment
3. DC-AC converter, Bridge rectifier
4. Boost DC-DC converter
5. Boost DC-DC converter
6. Buck DC-DC converter
7. Buck DC-DC converter
8. Mid-term exam.
9. Flyback DC-DC converter
10. Flyback DC-DC converter
11. Introduction of Arduino
12. Full-bridge DC-DC converter
13. Full-bridge DC-DC converter
14. Full-bridge DC-AC inverter
15. Full-bridge DC-AC inverter
16. Final exam
materials:
Text: Class notes
Reference:"Power Electronics", Daniel Hart, McGraw Hill, 東華書局
